name: 2023 12th International Conference on Economics and Finance Research
content: Publication: Submissions will be reviewed by the conference committees and accepted papers will be published in following journals: 1\. International Journal of Trade, Economics and Finance (IJTEF), which will be indexed by ProQuest, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library, EBSCO, etc. DOI: 10.18178/IJTEF ISSN: 2010-023X (Print) 2\. Journal of Economics, Business and Management (JOEBM), which will be indexed by CNKI, Electronic Journals Library, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, MESLibrary, Google Scholar, and Crossref. DOI: 10.18178/JOEBM ISSN: 2301-3567
